Body: Description: Hello team, I would like to ask if the EPP tool has the ability to monitor or block the following types of transfers: 1: When the following command is executed: curl --upload-file file.zip https://transfer.sh/file.zip 2: Through a custom file server using SOCKS5 3: RDP channels 4: SSH tunnels Can you please confirm that the EPP can handle and block/monitor these transfer scenarios? Thank you!

Next Steps Updated: Checking with R&D if the transfers can be monitored.

I sent the customer the response for each of the transfer type

What We've Learned Updated: The customer asked if EPP has the ability to monitor or block the following types of transfers: 1: When the following command is executed: curl --upload-file file.zip https://transfer.sh/file.zip 2: Through a custom file server using SOCKS5 3: RDP channels 4: SSH tunnels
